name: Offal Walker
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Lasso attack for each gut lasso it has then uses Reel.

actions.name: Lasso
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, 30 ft., one target, 3 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the offal walker can't use the same gut lasso on another target.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 reach 5 ft. one target 8 (2d6+1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: Pulls one creature grappled by it up to 25 ft. straight toward it.

special_abilities.name: Gut Lassos
special_abilities.desc: Can have up to three gut lassos at a time. Each gut lasso can be attacked (AC 13; 5 hp; immunity to poison). Destroying a lasso deals no damage to the offal walker which can extrude a replacement gut lasso on its next turn. A gut lasso can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 13 Str check vs. it.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.
